lyrics.stanza: Since Christ my soul from sin set free, This life has been a joy to me; And 'mid earth's sorrows and its woe, 'Tis joy my Jesus here to know.
O hallelujah, yes, 'tis joy! For it is Christ that I enjoy! On land or sea, what matters where? Where Jesus is, my joy is there.
The earth was once a bitter place Till Jesus showed His smiling face; Now joy's begun within my soul, 'Twill last while endless ages roll.
What matters where on earth we dwell? On mountain top, or in the dell, In cottage, or a mansion fair, Where Jesus is, my joy is there.
